Dimmer.name: Dimmer
Dimmer.description: This IPSO object should be used with a dimmer or level control to report the state of the control.

Level.name: Level
Level.description: Proportional control, integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

On_time.name: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds that the dimmer has been on (Dimmer value has to be > 0). Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Off_Time.name: Off Time
Off_Time.description: The time in seconds that the dimmer has been off  (dimmer value less or equal to 0) Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
